articles.description: Families hunting for oxygen, a patient dying in a hospital parking lot; ‘we’ve seen such horrors’ says a crematorium worker
articles.content:
Jayant Malhotra
says he wont ever forget the sight of the bodies. They arrived in a relentless, urgent flow for cremationa service he and his father offer in New Delhi free-of-charge for victims of … [+6467 chars]

articles.author: Kelly Malcom
articles.title: Escape from oblivion: How the brain reboots after deep anesthesia - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Millions of surgical procedures performed each year would not be possible without the aid of general anesthesia, the miraculous medical ability to turn off consciousness in a reversible and controllable way.
